segments.text: I notice how the sunlight streams through the window, illuminating the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It creates this beautiful contrast with the chaos happening inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but feel a sense of foreboding when I see the water overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman looks so peaceful, polishing that plate as if nothing is wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the boy is precariously perched on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost maddening how unaware she is of the risks around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands there, eyes shining with anticipation for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but wish she'd just take a step back and see the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a juxtaposition of innocence and neglect in this moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I find myself holding my breath, waiting for something to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR
